thread.title: Marco Polo's will sheds new light on famed traveller

title: Marco Polo's will sheds new light on famed traveller
text:
Marco Polo's will sheds new light on famed traveller 5:57pm BST - 01:17 
A book is released by a Venetian publisher giving scholars an insight into famed traveller Marco Polo's final hours. Francis Maguire reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
A book is released by a Venetian publisher giving scholars an insight into famed traveller Marco Polo's final hours. Francis Maguire reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2JUKG44
